name: user:act_as
description: Let's you act as this user on other resources.

name: channel:clip:create:self
description: Create new clips from videos on your channel.

name: channel:clip:delete:self
description: Allows deleting existing clips on your channel.

name: chat:bypass_links
description: Bypass links being disallowed in chat.

name: chat:chat
description: Interact with chats on your behalf.

name: chat:clear_messages
description: Clear messages in chats where authorized.

name: chat:edit_options
description: Edit chat options, including links settings and slowchat.

name: chat:giveaway_start
description: Start a giveaway in chats where authorized.

name: chat:poll_start
description: Start a poll in chats where authorized.

name: chat:purge
description: Clear all messages from a specific user in chat.

name: chat:remove_message
description: Remove own and other's messages in chat.

name: chat:whisper
description: Gives the ability to whisper in a channel

name: delve:view:self
description: View your Mixer homepage experience and recommendations.

name: interactive:manage:self
description: Create, update and delete the interactive games in your account.

name: interactive:robot:self
description: Run as an interactive game in your channel.

name: log:view:self
description: View and manage your security log.

name: oauth:manage:self
description: View and manage your OAuth clients.

name: redeemable:create:self
description: Create redeemables after performing a purchase.

name: resource:find:self
description: View emoticons and other graphical resources you have access to.

name: team:administer
description: Administrate teams the user has rights in.

name: team:manage:self
description: Create, join, leave teams and set the users primary team.

name: user:details:self
description: View your email address and other private details.

name: user:seen:self
description: Mark a VOD as seen for the user.

name: user:update:self
description: Update your account, including your email but not your password.
